= location( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments match the location an item is in.

Allows for customising a rule so it only works for a specific location.

== Alias ==

  * `loc`

== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N (string) = location

== Remarks ==

  * use localised text for non english clients

== Notes ==

  * Bag = `"bag"`, or localised string

  * Keyring = `"keyring"`, `"key"`, or localised string

  * Bank = `"bank"`, or localised string

  * Guild Bank = `"guild bank"`, `"vault"`, or localised string

  * Mail = `"mail"`, or localised string

  * Wearing = `"wearing"`, `"gear"`, or localised string

  * Pet = `"pet"` or localised string

  * Mount = `"mount"`, or localised string

  * Token = `"token"`, or "currency" or localised string

== Examples ==

  * `loc( "bag" )`

  * `loc( "gear" )`

  * `loc( "sac" )`  (french)
